item.title: 亚洲股市升至六周高位；贵金属走势强劲
item.description: 周五，亚洲股市升至六周以来的最高点，贵金属涨势迅猛，丝毫没有回落的迹象，投资者试图以高位结束今年的投资，而日元走软使干预风险继续存在。【原文：Asian stocks rose to their highest in six weeks on Friday and a blistering rally in precious metals showed no signs of tempering as investors sought to close out the year on a high while a softer yen kept intervention risk in the fray.】

item.title: 现货白银延续涨势，首次触及每盎司 75 美元
item.description: 受强劲的工业和投资需求、库存收紧、地缘政治紧张局势和美国进一步降息预期的支撑，现货白银周五攀升至每盎司 75 美元。【原文：Spot silver climbed to $75 an ounce on Friday, supported by robust industrial and investment demand, tightening inventories, geopolitical tensions and expectations of further U.S. interest rate cuts.】

item.title: 国营媒体报道：中国启动风险投资基金，投资 "硬科技
item.description: 据国家广播公司中央电视台报道，中国周五启动了三支风险投资基金，投资于 "硬技术 "领域。【原文：China on Friday launched three venture capital funds to invest in "hard technology" areas, state broadcaster CCTV reported.】

item.title: 市场权衡委内瑞拉供应风险，石油上涨
item.description: 在美国下令加大对委内瑞拉石油运输的经济压力，并应尼日利亚政府的请求对尼日利亚西北部的伊斯兰国武装分子实施空袭之后，周五油价攀升。【原文：Oil prices climbed on Friday after the U.S. ordered increased economic pressure on Venezuelan oil shipments and carried out airstrikes against Islamic State militants in northwest Nigeria at the request of Nigeria's government.】

item.title: 中国称希望企业就 TikTok 交易寻求合法、平衡的解决方案
item.description: 中国商务部发言人周四在被问及 TikTok 移交美国业务一事时表示，中国政府希望看到企业达成符合中国法律法规、平衡各方利益的解决方案。【原文：The Chinese government would like to see companies reach solutions that comply with Chinese laws and regulations and balance the interests of all parties, a commerce ministry spokesperson said on Thursday when asked about the hand-over of TikTok's U.S. operations.】

item.title: CAICT数据显示，11月中国外资品牌手机出货量同比增长一倍多
item.description: 路透社根据一家隶属于政府的研究公司周四公布的数据计算得出的结果显示，包括苹果公司 iPhone 手机在内的外国品牌手机 11 月份在中国的出货量同比增长了 128.4%。【原文：Shipments of foreign-branded mobile phones, including Apple's iPhones, rose 128.4% in China in November from the same month last year, according to Reuters calculations based on data released by a government-affiliated research firm on Thursday.】

item.title: 民主党州长呼吁特朗普政府解除对海上风电项目的冻结
item.description: 四位民主党州长周三致信美国内政部长道格-伯格姆，要求特朗普政府取消对美国东海岸五个海上风电项目的禁令。【原文：Four Democratic governors wrote to U.S. Interior Secretary Doug Burgum on Wednesday to ask the Trump administration to lift its halt on five offshore wind projects on the U.S. East Coast.】

item.title: 据 CNBC 报道，英伟达将以约 200 亿美元收购人工智能芯片初创公司 Groq
item.description: 据 CNBC 周三报道，Nvidia 已同意以 200 亿美元现金收购高性能人工智能加速芯片设计商 Groq。【原文：Nvidia has agreed to buy Groq, a designer of high-performance artificial intelligence accelerator chips, for $20 billion in cash, CNBC reported on Wednesday.】

item.title: 塞尔维亚国家创新公司获美国批准谈判出售俄罗斯股份
item.description: 据塞尔维亚国有RTS电视台周三报道，美国已批准塞尔维亚炼油厂NIS在3月24日前就出售其俄罗斯所有者的股份进行谈判。【原文：The U.S. has granted Serbian oil refiner NIS until March 24 to negotiate the sale of its Russian owner's stake, Serbia's state-owned RTS TV reported on Wednesday.】

item.title: 17 亿美元的强力球大奖为节日财富提供了机会
item.description: 在周三晚上的开奖之前，美国强力球彩票大奖已经攀升至 17 亿美元，美国历史上最大的彩票大奖之一近在咫尺--正好赶上圣诞节。【原文：The U.S. Powerball jackpot has climbed to $1.7 billion ahead of Wednesday night's drawing, putting one of the biggest lottery prizes in American history within reach — just in time for Christmas.】

item.title: 受降息押注推动，标普 500 指数盘中创历史新高
item.description: 周三，由于投资者重返人工智能类股，并押注美联储明年将再次降息，S&P 500 指数盘中创下一个多月来的新高。【原文：The S&P 500 index hit an intraday record high on Wednesday, its first in over a month, as investors returned to AI stocks and bet the Federal Reserve will cut rates again next year.】

item.title: 中国陆地空间公司希望在 2026 年中期完成火箭回收
item.description: 中国火箭开发商陆地空间公司（LandSpace）的一位高管在接受采访时说，该公司计划在 2026 年中期成功回收一枚可重复使用的助推器，这凸显了这家总部位于北京的公司要成为中国太空探索技术公司（SpaceX）的雄心壮志。【原文：Chinese rocket developer LandSpace plans to successfully recover a reusable booster in mid-2026, a company executive said in an interview, underscoring the Beijing-based firm's ambition to become China's answer to SpaceX.】

item.title: US weekly jobless claims unexpectedly fall
item.description: The number of Americans filing new applications for jobless benefits unexpectedly fell last week, but the unemployment rate likely remained high in December amid sluggish hiring.

item.title: Agios Pharma shares jump as US FDA expands approval for its blood disorder drug
item.description: Shares of Agios Pharmaceuticals jumped nearly 12% premarket on Wednesday after the U.S. Food and Drug Administration approved the expanded use of its drug for the treatment of a type of blood disorder.

item.title: 继英国石油公司交易之后，Stonepeak 和 CPPIB 寻求溢价收购嘉实多印度股票
item.description: 加拿大养老金计划投资委员会（Canada Pension Plan Investment Board）和美国私募股权公司斯顿皮克（Stonepeak）周三表示，继从母公司英国石油公司（BP）收购嘉实多印度分公司之后，他们将发起收购嘉实多印度分公司最多 26% 股份的要约。【原文：Canada Pension Plan Investment Board and U.S. private equity firm Stonepeak will launch an offer to purchase a stake of up to 26% in Castrol's Indian unit, they said on Wednesday, following their deal to acquire the firm from parent BP .】

item.title: 圣诞节前夕交易缩短，期货下跌
item.description: 周三，美国股指期货在圣诞节前夕的清淡交易中走低，交易商们正在观望股市能否在市场季节性走强的时期延续创纪录的涨势。【原文：U.S. stock index futures edged lower in thin Christmas Eve trading on Wednesday, as traders wait to see whether stocks can extend record gains in a seasonally strong stretch for markets.】

item.title: 美国汽车安全机构调查特斯拉 Model 3 紧急车门释放情况
item.description: 美国汽车安全监管机构周三表示，已对特斯拉 Model 3 紧凑型轿车展开缺陷调查，原因是担心在紧急情况下，车门紧急释放控制装置可能不容易触及或无法清楚辨认。【原文：The U.S. auto safety regulator said on Wednesday it has opened a defect investigation into Tesla Model 3 compact sedans over concerns that emergency door release controls may not be easily accessible or clearly identifiable in an emergency.】

item.title: 人工智能支出、企业利润强劲、美联储降息被视为 2026 年股市的关键所在
item.description: 美国股市连续第三年以两位数百分比的涨幅收官。要在2026年实现第四个 "辉煌年"，可能是一项艰巨的任务，这需要强劲的盈利、鸽派的美联储和强劲的人工智能支出。【原文：The U.S. stock market is closing the books on a third straight year of double-digit percentage gains. A fourth stellar year in 2026 may be a tall order, requiring strong earnings, a dovish Federal Reserve and strong artificial intelligence spending.】

item.title: 随着加密货币和私人信贷成为主流，投资者风险倍增
item.description: 随着特朗普政府和美国证券交易委员会推动市场开放，美国投资者可能很快就能获得更多与私人信贷和加密货币等资产类别相关的产品。【原文：U.S. investors may soon have access to a greater array of products tied to asset classes like private credit and crypto as the Trump administration and SEC push to open markets, a change that some investment advisors say puts too much onus on individuals to protect themselves.】

item.title: 洞察：硅谷交易商如何迷倒特朗普并给英特尔带来生机
item.description: 那是一个黎明前的星期四，在硅谷，英特尔公司首席执行官陈立武发现自己受到了美国总统的攻击。【原文：It was a Thursday before dawn in Silicon Valley when Intel CEO Lip-Bu Tan found himself under attack by the president of the United States.】

item.title: 减肥药获批将加速食品工业的产品改革
item.description: 分析师说，由于新批准的抑制食欲的 GLP-1 药片将于 1 月份上市，包装食品制造商和快餐店明年可能被迫对更多产品进行全面检查。【原文：Packaged food makers and fast-food restaurants may be forced to overhaul more of their products next year as newly approved, appetite-suppressing GLP-1 pills become available in January, analysts say.】

item.title: 洞察："不是一个快乐的特朗普支持者"：牧场主受到降低牛肉价格的冲击
item.description: 加里-维特 10 岁时开始在自家农场喂牛。【原文：Gary Vetter was 10 years old when he started feeding cattle at his family's farm.】

item.title: 苹果公司蒂姆-库克买入 300 万美元股票，耐克公司股价攀升
item.description: 苹果公司首席执行官蒂姆-库克（Tim Cook）购买了耐克公司价值近 300 万美元的股票后，耐克公司股价在周三的盘前交易中上涨了 2%。【原文：Nike shares ticked up 2% in premarket trading on Wednesday after Apple CEO Tim Cook bought nearly $3 million worth of the sportswear maker's stock.】

item.title: 意大利监管机构命令 Meta 停止 WhatsApp 禁止竞争对手人工智能聊天机器人的条款
item.description: 意大利反垄断机构（AGCM）周三命令 Meta Platforms 暂停执行可能将竞争对手的人工智能聊天机器人拒之门外的合同条款，因为该机构正在调查这家美国科技集团涉嫌滥用支配地位的行为。【原文：Italy's antitrust authority (AGCM) on Wednesday ordered Meta Platforms to suspend contractual terms that could shut rival AI chatbots out of WhatsApp, as it investigates the U.S. tech group for suspected abuse of a dominant position.】

item.title: 美国国家公路交通安全管理局（NHTSA）称，现代汽车将因起火风险在美国召回51,000多辆汽车
item.description: 美国国家公路交通安全管理局（U.S. National Highway Traffic Safety Administration）周三表示，现代汽车公司（Hyundai Motor）将在美国召回51587辆汽车，原因是线束安装不正确导致的拖车灯短路可能增加起火风险。【原文：Hyundai Motor is recalling 51,587 vehicles in the U.S. because a short circuit in non-functioning trailer lights, caused by incorrect installation of the wiring harness, could increase the risk of fire, the U.S. National Highway Traffic Safety Administration said on Wednesday.】

item.title: 赛诺菲将以 22 亿美元收购美国生物技术公司 Dynavax
item.description: 法国制药商赛诺菲公司周三表示，已就收购美国疫苗公司Dynavax Technologies Corporation达成协议，收购价格约为22亿美元（18.7亿欧元）。【原文：French drugmaker Sanofi has entered into an agreement to acquire U.S. vaccines company Dynavax Technologies Corporation for around $2.2 billion (1.87 billion euros), it said on Wednesday.】

item.title: 黄金突破 4,500 美元，白银和铂金在金属市场狂潮中创下纪录
item.description: 周三，黄金价格首次突破每盎司4,500美元大关，白银和铂金也创下历史新高，原因是投资者因避险需求和对明年美国利率将进一步下降的预期而纷纷涌入贵金属市场。【原文：Gold surged past the $4,500-an-ounce mark for the first time on Wednesday, while silver and platinum also scaled record highs, as investors piled into precious metals on safe-haven demand and expectations that U.S. interest rates will fall further next year.】

item.title: 英国石油公司将以 60 亿美元的价格向斯顿皮克公司出售嘉实多 65% 的股份
item.description: 英国石油公司（BP）已同意以约 60 亿美元的价格将嘉实多润滑油业务 65% 的股份出售给美国投资公司 Stonepeak，这是该石油巨头 200 亿美元资产剥离计划中的重要一步，该计划旨在削减债务和提高回报。【原文：BP has agreed to sell a 65% stake in its Castrol lubricants business to U.S. investment firm Stonepeak for about $6 billion, a significant step in the oil major’s $20 billion divestment plan aimed at cutting debt and boosting returns.】

item.title: 韩国法院驳回阻止韩国锌业出售与美国冶炼厂有关股份的请求
item.description: 韩国锌业公司发言人表示，韩国法院周三驳回了韩国锌业公司两大股东--MBK Partners和YoungPoong--提出的阻止该锌精炼企业发行新股以资助一个价值74亿美元的美国冶炼厂项目的请求。【原文：A South Korean court on Wednesday rejected a request by two major shareholders of Korea Zinc - MBK Partners and YoungPoong - to block the zinc refiner's plan to issue new shares to help fund a $7.4 billion U.S. smelter project, a spokesperson for Korea Zinc said.】

item.title: 美国经济增长强劲，供应风险加大，石油价格上涨
item.description: 受美国经济强劲增长以及委内瑞拉和俄罗斯供应中断风险的支撑，周三油价小幅上涨，延续了上一交易日的涨势。【原文：Oil prices posted modest rises on Wednesday, extending gains from the previous session, supported by robust U.S. economic growth and the risk of supply disruptions from Venezuela and Russia.】
